ggplot: 2è»¸ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®æ•°å€¤èª¿æ•´

Source: ../../vignettes/va_resc.Rmd
va_resc.Rmd

ã¯ã˜ã‚ã«

  • ãŸã¾ã«ãªäº‹ä¾‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒ, ggplot2 ã§2è»¸ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®ä½œå›³ã‚’è¡Œã„ãŸã„æ™‚ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™.
  • ggplot2ã®version 2.2.0 ã‹ã‚‰ã¯ sec_axis() ãŒå°å…¥ã•ã‚Œ, cowplot ğŸ“¦ ãªã©ã‚’ä½¿ã‚ãªãã¦ã‚‚2è»¸ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ãŒæã‘ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸ. ãŸã , 2è»¸ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®æç”»ã«ã¯ã‚¯ã‚»ãŒã‚ã‚Š, å³è»¸ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆã—ãŸã„æ•°å€¤ã®å¤‰æ›ã¨å³è»¸ç›®ç››ã‚Šæ•°å€¤ã®å¤‰æ›ã‚’ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶å´ã§ è¡Œã†å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ (ä¸‹è¨˜ã®å‚è€ƒæƒ…å ±ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚‚å‚ç…§ãã ã•ã„).
  • ãã“ã§, ã“ã®2æ®µéšã®æ•°å€¤å¤‰æ›ã‚’æ¥½ã«ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•° frabento::va_resc() ã‚’ä½œã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸ.

ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹ 

library(frabento)       # ã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸
library(tidyverse)      # ggplot2ã¨tidyãªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
library(patchwork)      # ggplotã‚’ç°¡å˜, ã‚­ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã«ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
library(fontregisterer) # ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆã®åˆ©ç”¨ã‚’æ¥½ã«ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚
library(ggtext)         # element_markdown() ã‚’ä½¿ã†ãŸã‚
library(ggh4x)          # Hacks for ggplot2

åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹

ç›®çš„ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆcars (Speed and Stopping Distances of Cars) ã‚’ä¾‹ã«, å·¦è»¸ã«Speed (å¤‰æ•°åspeed), å³è»¸ã«Distances (å¤‰æ•°ådist) ã‚’ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹.

theme_set(theme_linedraw(base_family = "Helvetica") + theme(aspect.ratio = 1/1))

# cars ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿
head(cars, n = 3); tail(cars, n = 3)
#>   speed dist
#> 1     4    2
#> 2     4   10
#> 3     7    4
#>    speed dist
#> 48    24   93
#> 49    24  120
#> 50    25   85

# ã€å¤§äº‹ã€‘å„å¤‰æ•°ã®ç¯„å›²ã‚’çŸ¥ã‚‹
(lh <- range(cars$speed, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1]  4 25
(rh <- range(cars$dist, na.rm = TRUE))
#> [1]   2 120

# ä½œå›³ã®ãŸã‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å¤‰å½¢
cars_longformat <- cars %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "ID") %>%
    tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = -"ID", names_to = "name", values_to = "val")

# æ¯”è¼ƒç”¨ã«ç´ ã®å€¤ã‚’ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆ (1è»¸ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•)
g0 <- cars_longformat %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID), y = val, group = name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ç´ ã®å€¤")

# 2è»¸ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆ
g1 <- cars_longformat %>%
    # distã®å€¤ã‚’å·¦è»¸ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦ãƒªã‚¹ã‚±ãƒ¼ãƒ«
    dplyr::mutate(val_resc = if_else(name == "dist",
                                     va_resc(val, lh_lim = lh, rh_lim = rh, "var"),
                                     val)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID), y = val_resc, group = name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
    scale_y_continuous(name = "Speed",
                       # å³è»¸ã®ç›®ç››ã‚Šæ•°å€¤ã‚’ãƒªã‚¹ã‚±ãƒ¼ãƒ«
                       sec.axis = sec_axis(~ va_resc(., lh, rh, "axis"),
                                           breaks = c(2, 85, 120), # ç¢ºèªç”¨
                                           name = "Distances")) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "å„å¤‰æ•°ã®æœ€å°ãƒ»æœ€å¤§å€¤")

# patchwork
g0 + g1 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, guides = "collect")

æœ€å¤§å€¤ (åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«æ­£å€¤ã‚’æƒ³å®š) ã¾ãŸã¯æœ€å°å€¤ (åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«è² å€¤ã‚’æƒ³å®š) ã®ã¿ã®æŒ‡å®šã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™. ã“ã®å ´åˆ, ã‚‚ã†ä¸€æ–¹ã®å€¤ã¯è‡ªå‹•çš„ã« 0 ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™.
ã¾ãŸ, ä»»æ„ã®ç¯„å›²æŒ‡å®šã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã§ã™.

# å„å¤‰æ•°ã®æœ€å¤§å€¤
(lhmax <- max(lh))
#> [1] 25
(rhmax <- max(rh))
#> [1] 120

g2 <- cars_longformat %>%
    dplyr::mutate(val_resc = if_else(name == "dist",
                                     va_resc(val, lhmax, rhmax, "var"),
                                     val)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID), y = val_resc, group = name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
    scale_y_continuous(name = "Speed",
                       sec.axis = sec_axis(~ va_resc(., lhmax, rhmax, "axis"),
                                           breaks = c(2, 85, 120), # ç¢ºèªç”¨
                                           name = "Distances")) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "å„å¤‰æ•°ã®æœ€å¤§å€¤")

# ä»»æ„ã®æœ€å¤§å€¤
lhmax_arb <- 50
rhmax_arb <- 150

g3 <- cars_longformat %>%
    dplyr::mutate(val_resc = if_else(name == "dist",
                                     va_resc(val, lhmax_arb, rhmax_arb, "var"),
                                     val)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID), y = val_resc, group = name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
    scale_y_continuous(name = "Speed",
                       sec.axis = sec_axis(~ va_resc(., lhmax_arb, rhmax_arb, "axis"),
                                           breaks = c(2, 85, 120), # ç¢ºèªç”¨
                                           name = "Distances")) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ä»»æ„ã®æœ€å¤§å€¤") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(NA, lhmax_arb))

# ä»»æ„ã®ç¯„å›²
lh_arb <- c(10, 30)
rh_arb <- c(50, 100)

g4 <- cars_longformat %>%
    dplyr::mutate(val_resc = if_else(name == "dist",
                                     va_resc(val, lh_arb, rh_arb, "var"),
                                     val)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID), y = val_resc, group = name)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
    scale_y_continuous(name = "Speed",
                       sec.axis = sec_axis(~ va_resc(., lh_arb, rh_arb, "axis"),
                                           breaks = c(rh_arb, 85), # ç¢ºèªç”¨
                                           name = "Distances")) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ä»»æ„ã®ç¯„å›²") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = lh_arb)

# patchwork
g2 + g3 + g4 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, guides = "collect", byrow = TRUE)

å‚è€ƒæƒ…å ±

  • ã“ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’å‚è€ƒã«ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸ. ã“ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚‚å¤šåˆ†åŒã˜äºº.

  • ã€æ³¨ç›®ã€‘ ggh4xãŒåˆ¥ã®è§£æ³•ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™. geom_*()ã‚’é‡ã­ã¦ä½¿ã†å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã¿ãŸã„ãªã®ã§, ç”¨é€”ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ä½¿ã„åˆ†ã‘ã‚‹ã®ãŒè‰¯ã•ãã†ã§ã™.

# --> ggh4x::help_secondary()

# default = range
sec_range <- help_secondary(cars, speed, dist, method = "range",
                            name = "Distances", breaks = c(2, 85, 120)) # ç¢ºèªç”¨

gh1 <- cars %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "ID") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID))) +
    geom_line(aes(y = speed), colour = "blue") +
    geom_line(aes(y = sec_range$proj(dist)), colour = "red") +
    scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_range) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ggh4x:range")

# max
sec_max <- help_secondary(cars, speed, dist, method = "max",
                          name = "Distances", breaks = c(2, 85, 120)) # ç¢ºèªç”¨

gh2 <- cars %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "ID") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID))) +
    geom_line(aes(y = speed), colour = "blue") +
    geom_line(aes(y = sec_max$proj(dist)), colour = "red") +
    scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_max) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ggh4x:max")

# fit lm(primary ~ secondary)
sec_fit <- help_secondary(cars, speed, dist, method = "fit",
                          name = "Distances", breaks = c(2, 85, 120)) # ç¢ºèªç”¨

gh3 <- cars %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "ID") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID))) +
    geom_line(aes(y = speed), colour = "blue") +
    geom_line(aes(y = sec_fit$proj(dist)), colour = "red") +
    scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_fit) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ggh4x:fit")

# ccf
sec_ccf <- help_secondary(cars, speed, dist, method = "ccf",
                          name = "Distances", breaks = c(2, 85, 120)) # ç¢ºèªç”¨

gh4 <- cars %>%
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = "ID") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = as.integer(ID))) +
    geom_line(aes(y = speed), colour = "blue") +
    geom_line(aes(y = sec_ccf$proj(dist)), colour = "red") +
    scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_ccf) +
    labs(x = "Observation ID", title = "ggh4x:ccf")

# patchwork
gh1 + gh2 + gh3 + gh4 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
